MARKETS SURGE: Dow Jones jumps 450 points as inflation data shows unexpected cooling, Treasury yields drop sharply
SENATE SHOWDOWN: Infrastructure negotiations extend past midnight as bipartisan group seeks compromise on $1.2 trillion package
SUPREME COURT: Justices agree to hear case challenging state voter ID laws in what could reshape election access nationwide
CLIMATE SUMMIT: World leaders gather in Geneva to finalize carbon reduction targets, developing nations demand financial support
BIG TECH REGULATION: House committee advances antitrust legislation targeting Apple, Google, Amazon monopolistic practices
WILDFIRE CRISIS: California declares state of emergency as early season fires consume 50,000 acres, evacuations underway
EDUCATION OVERHAUL: Bipartisan bill proposes $100 billion investment in public schools, teacher pay raises
RECORD TURNOUT: Special elections in three swing districts see highest participation since 2008, results too close to call
FED HOLDS STEADY: Federal Reserve keeps interest rates unchanged despite inflation concerns, economists divided on next move
DEMOGRAPHIC SHIFT: New census data reveals historic migration patterns, Sun Belt states gain congressional seats
HEALTHCARE COSTS: Poll shows 73% of Americans rate medical expenses as top concern ahead of next election cycle
MARS MISSION: NASA unveils timeline for crewed mission to red planet by 2035, international partnerships critical
MISINFORMATION CRISIS: Survey finds 6 in 10 Americans can't distinguish real news from fake, social media blamed
TWITTER SCANDAL: Celebrity's account apparently hacked, posts sensitive government codes before deletion, FBI investigating
UNREAD LEGISLATION: Congressional watchdog reports 847-page bill received 2 hours before vote, no members confirm reading it
INFRASTRUCTURE WEEK: White House announces 47th iteration of infrastructure week, public skepticism reaches all-time high
SPECIES DISCOVERY: Marine biologists identify new deep-sea organism, immediately deadlocked over taxonomic classification
NOTHING BURGER UPDATE: Independent investigation confirms suspected scandal was indeed nothing, pundits issue non-apologies
SOCIAL MEDIA TRENDS: #IsThisRealLife dominates Twitter as users question whether political discourse has become performance art
STATISTICS STUDY: Meta-analysis reveals 100% of research papers selectively cite data supporting predetermined conclusions
FACT-CHECKER EXODUS: Third major fact-checking organization announces closure, staff cite burnout and futility of mission
AUTHENTICITY PARADOX: Political consultants caught testing 47 versions of 'authentic' candidate persona in focus groups
BIPARTISAN BREAKDOWN: Lawmakers' pledge to work together collapses 11 minutes after joint press conference ends
LEAK INVESTIGATION: Junior staffer's reply-all email exposes internal strategy memo to 2,000 journalists, resignation pending
CAMPAIGN PROMISES: Wildlife researchers deploy tracking technology to locate missing policy commitments, all signals go cold
SPIN RECORD: Press secretary's explanation of president's gaffe requires three follow-up clarifications and one correction
POLLING ERROR: Margin of error in latest survey (+/- 8%) exceeds actual data range, pollster defends methodology
DEBATE CHAOS: Moderator's attempts to enforce time limits ignored by all candidates, resorts to air horn in final minutes
FACT-CHECK LOOP: Verification of fact-check accuracy requires second fact-check, triggering infinite regression
SOURCE CONFIRMATION: Anonymous official confirms unnamed source's account of secret meeting no one will go on record about
META BREAKING NEWS: Network apologizes for breaking news alert about breaking news alerts, promises to break cycle
BALLOON DIPLOMACY: NORAD tracks high-altitude object for 600 miles; turns out to be a dealership gorilla missing since Black Friday
SUBPOENA SNAFU: Committee accidentally subpoenas its own chair after copy-paste error, chair vows full compliance
ZOOM GAFFE: Senator forgets mic is on, orders lunch mid-hearing; lobbyists immediately send matching sandwich platters
CRYPTO CRASH COURSE: Congressman asks if Bitcoin is 'the one with the dog,' witnesses nod to move things along
TRAIN DELAY: High-speed rail groundbreaking rescheduled for 12th consecutive year, officials say ribbon is still on track
AI APOLOGY TOUR: Campaign releases statement written by chatbot, apologizing for previous chatbot-written statement
CENSUS CORRECTION: Statistical agency admits counting one state twice; insists bonus representation is 'economies of scale'
SPACE FORCE DRILL: Accidental alert plays Star Wars theme over base intercom, morale spikes, readiness unchanged
TURKEY PARDON: White House accidentally pardons actual attorney named Tom Turkey; lawyer declines to appeal
WATER PRESSER: City holds press conference to declare boil-water advisory over, runs out of bottled water on stage
NATO NAME GAME: Summit agenda derails for 27 minutes over debate about whether 'north' should be lowercase in draft
BUDGET BREAKDOWN: Agency admits half its pie chart was clip art; promises to switch to bar graphs pending approval
FILIBUSTER FEEDBACK: Senator reads own bill for 11 hours before realizing teleprompter is on loop
SITUATION ROOM LOCK-IN: Intern accidentally triggers blast doors, national security team conducts briefing through mail slot
RIBBON CUT FAIL: New pedestrian bridge opens, ribbon snaps back and knocks mayor's hat into river; livestream goes viral
CRYPTO PRIMER: Lawmaker asks hearing witness to 'explain blockchain, but slower, and with crayons'
BEAR DIET ALERT: Park Service warns bears rejecting human food unless it's keto; visitors told to pack almonds
CLIMATE REPORT: 800-page assessment released in triplicate, remains shrink-wrapped on every committee desk
SEAL OF APPROVAL: State seal redesign contest won by AI image of raccoon holding Wi-Fi symbol
AR ADDRESS: Governor delivers State of the State with puppy-ear filter on, staff calls it 'relatable innovation'
CICADA POLL: 54% of respondents unsure if buzzing sound is insects or a third-party campaign launch
UFO REPORT: Pentagon releases 200-page document; every noun redacted, adjectives left for vibes
VIBES ECONOMICS: Federal Reserve official says outlook is 'mostly chill' pending data or feelings, whichever arrives first
PUNCTUATION LAW: Town council misplaces comma, briefly legalizes 'all fireworks and taxes'
BUS DELAY: Candidate's campaign bus stuck in EV charger line, staff canvass nearby rest stop
VIRTUAL BACKDROP: Disaster relief hearing paused after representative appears on beach Zoom background sipping mocktail
MIC CHECK: Senate hearing delayed 14 minutes by chorus of 'is this thing on' from every dais microphone
FLASH MOB DRILL: Fire alarm test coincides with flash mob rehearsal; building evacuates doing coordinated jazz hands
GOURD BAN: Agriculture department warns decorative gourds now classified as invasive; fall wedding industry in uproar
MISPLACED PROCLAMATION: Mayor signs proclamation honoring rival city three states away, blames GPS
CITATION NEEDED: Court opinion briefly cites Wikipedia page mid-edit war; footnote updates twice before ruling finalized
